verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, will I <S%H2167>sing<s%>.

I will behave myself <S%H7919>wisely<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>. O when wilt thou <S%H935>come<s%> unto me? I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> with a <S%H8537>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> no <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: I <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6213>work<s%> of them that turn <S%H7750>aside<s%>; it shall not <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to me. wicked: Heb. thing of Belial
A <S%H6141>froward<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from me: I will not <S%H3045>know<s%> a <S%H7451>wicked<s%> person.

Whoso <S%H5643>privily<s%> <S%H3960>slandereth<s%> <S%H3960><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, him will I cut <S%H6789>off<s%>: him that hath an <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%> and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> will not I <S%H3201>suffer<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be upon the <S%H539>faithful<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with me: he that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, he shall <S%H8334>serve<s%> me. in a: or, perfect in the way

He that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> <S%H7423>deceit<s%> shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>: he that <S%H1696>telleth<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall not <S%H3559>tarry<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>. shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established

I will <S%H1242>early<s%> <S%H6789>destroy<s%> all the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; that I may cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H6466>doers<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
